description.en: Frequently asked questions about Monterosso al Mare. Beaches, parking, trains, and practical visitor info.
description.de: Antworten auf die häufigsten Fragen zu Monterosso. Alles zu Anreise, Unterkünften, bester Reisezeit und Sehenswürdigkeiten.
description.fr: Réponses à toutes vos questions sur Monterosso al Mare : hébergement, transport, plages, randonnées et conseils de visite.

subtitle.en: Everything you need to know before visiting Monterosso. Practical answers to common questions.
subtitle.de: Antworten auf alle wichtigen Fragen für Ihren Besuch

answer.en: Partly. There are free public areas and paid beach clubs (stabilimenti) with sunbeds, umbrellas, and service.

question.en: Where should I stay - Old Town or Fegina?

answer.en: Old Town for charm and historic atmosphere, Fegina for beach access and modern amenities. Both connected by tunnel.
Yes, at Loreto parking area (~€25/day). The village center is car-free. Shuttle bus runs to center.

question.en: How do I get to the other villages?

answer.en: Train every 20 minutes (4 min between villages). Get Cinque Terre Card for unlimited rides + hiking trails.

question.en: Can I swim in the sea?

answer.en: Absolutely! May to October is best. Water is clean and clear. Both sandy and rocky swimming spots.
Yes, Monterosso has the best facilities of all five villages. ATMs, pharmacy, grocery stores, and more.
